channel.title: Facebook integration
channel.description: So, Runescape now allows social networking sites such as facebook. I think this is a terrible update! What is your opinion?

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Nexus_:

Jagex just wasted his time integrating Facebook and all, IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Jagex just wasted his time integrating Facebook and all, IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

idk I really dont care for this update… but at least it doesnt MAKE you log in via facebook. I don’t really like the newer account system with logging in via email (WoW did something like this a while back- I only played for a few months… but WoW you sign into an account and have multiple characters). At least with runescape they don’t require people with “older accounts” (older than 4 months or w/e its been) to use an email to log in…

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Seems like 4chan has another use now…

Read full topic

Why would I use FaceBook for Runescape?

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Terrible update. I’m not going to use it because what person wants to know that other people know he/she plays a game that became outdated when they graduated from elementary school.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:33, topic:396482”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=493653.msg3611344#msg3611344 date=1306616546]

It’s probably the least interesting update this year… Yet…

Just wish it was possible to hide the Facebook adverts everywhere, seeing as I’ve never liked Facebook. Schools in Norway are ruined due to Facebook; everyone talk about the latest Facebook news, nothing else.

I still remember when everything wasn’t all about Facebook, and who changed their sivil status…

Its all about Twitter now in America

fff you and your technology
Here in Egypt carrier pigeons are all the rage
[/quote]Which reminds me I shot yours by mistake, sorry bro.

Also just for being on topic,
krackkid and 5 others like this.[/quote]

Orcashark and 6 others like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:27, topic:396482”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493653.msg3610799#msg3610799 date=1306565948]

Fuck I got hacked, cause my friend knows my facebook information>.<

not ur friend

No I am his friend, dno’t prejudge pls!

Why are you friends with someone who would steal from you.
[/quote]
Because I know him and I am his friend from a long tiemm ago![/quote]Yeah I trust him even if he hacked me, I mean he got my back he just didn’t want my account doing nothing, thats all.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Jagex just made it 99% easier to hack RuneScape accounts considering with the click of a button and someone installing an app on facebook you can steal their password. Get ready for the flow of hacked threads guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook integration
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:15, topic:396482”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=493653.msg3609528#msg3609528 date=1306439407]

Horrible, why would I let a video game mix with my social life…
[/quote]This. Aren’t people who play video games supposed to be anti-social anyways?

No, not necessarily, that’s like judging a book by its cover.[/quote]Actually it’s stereotypical. Judging a book by its cover is definitely not the right analogy.

Read full topic
